sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly (name, email, location), information automatically collected (IP address, browser type), and information from third parties (social media profiles if you connect them).

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, personalize your experience, and comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: 3. Location Data
sections.content: We use your location to show you nearby clinics. Location data is collected through your browser with your permission or estimated from your IP address. You can disable location services at any time.

sections.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking
sections.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to remember your preferences, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

sections.title: 5. Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with service providers, for legal reasons, or with your consent. Clinic contact information you submit may be shared with the respective clinic.

sections.title: 6. Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

sections.title: 7. Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt-out of certain communications and request data portability where applicable.

sections.title: 8. Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our service is not intended for children under 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

sections.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

sections.title: 10. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at privacy@menshealthfinder.com.
